sub_title: Team Manager at Germany SailGP Team
summary: Highly organized ambitious young woman, result oriented. Always want to understand the bigger picture in order to contribute efficiently to the set objectives and meet the deadlines. The devil is in the details. I am an absolute team player, open communicator and can adjust to most any situations. Eager to learn, manage myself in order to deliver,  I am stress-resistant plus a true multitasker with an analytical eye. I know what I want and am not afraid to take a chance. In addition, I am humorous, assertive and extroverted.

profile_positions.description:
The Germany SailGP Team was founded by racing team owner Thomas Riedel and co-owner Sebastian Vettel and officially presented in May 2023. Both Thomas Riedel and the four-time Formula 1 World Champion Sebastian Vettel are active consultants for the new team under the German flag in the world league of sail racing. The annual, global championship features national teams battling in short, intense races at iconic stadium-style venues across the globe. Simultaneously we are racing for a better future, championing a world powered by nature using the platform to deliver climate-positive sports and entertainment, trying to push for victory both on and off the water.

SailGP is the world’s most exciting racing on water. The high-tech, high-speed action features sailing’s best athletes racing in identical hydrofoiling F50 catamarans, flying at speeds approaching 100 km/h.
profile_positions.title: Team Manager

profile_positions.description: To help deliver an effective and systematic Communications program to aid the brand and reputation of C-Job Naval Architects by identifying and developing new strategies and content for the website and social media. To ensure events run smoothly, within budget, and represent C-Job as the no. 1 considered independent ship design and engineering partner. To support C-Job operations by identifying opportunities for improvement and developing policies and procedures to optimize C-Job performance.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
C-Job Naval Architects offers high quality, innovative and sustainable solutions for the maritime industry. C-Job is your no. 1 go to partner for independent design and engineering. C-Job offers her clients a range of services spanning Naval Architecture, Mechanical Engineering, Structural Engineering, Building Supervision, Interior Engineering and Design. 

• Internal Marketing & Communication
• HR activities 
• Coordinating all corporate events and exhibitions
• Creating website content
• Management Assistance
profile_positions.title: Employer Branding & Event Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
SailGP is racing redefined. The world’s fastest-growing sports league, SailGP was established in 2018 and is headquartered in London. The annual, global championship aims to Race for the Future by showcasing the power of nature and accelerating change.

Led by world-class sailors Peter Burling and Blair Tuke, the New Zealand SailGP Team fosters an impressive lineup of New Zealand's best male and female sailors. Now into its second season in SailGP, the New Zealand SailGP Team is expected to be a genuine title contender this season.

The team has purpose embedded into our DNA through our partnership with Live Ocean, a marine conservation charity founded by Peter Burling and Blair Tuke in 2019. Proud winners of the inaugural Impact League trophy in Season 2 of SailGP, we have a large focus on operating sustainably and using our platform to take the message of ocean restoration and protection to the world stage.

In December 2021 it was announced New Zealand will host a Sail Grand Prix each of the next four seasons. The unique partnership with New Zealand Major Events, ChristchurchNZ, and Auckland Unlimited will see the event alternate between Christchurch and Auckland annually between 2023 and 2026.
profile_positions.title: Team Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
The Volvo Ocean Race takes place every 3 years and is the world’s longest professional sporting event and leading offshore sailing competition with professional crews racing around the world. The 13th edition of the Volvo Ocean Race starts in Alicante in Autumn 2017.

Operations support
• Accreditation Coordinator as main job: i.e. Working on how to improve our accreditation system and process
• Support Race Village Experience Manager
• Support Logistics team i.e.; Organizing Visa’s, Crew Catering, Laundry 
• Over-all support; petty cash, coordinating run-sheet regards car bookings and various other tasks to support
profile_positions.title: Accreditation Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
To remain a leading player in the men’s premium branded jeans and casual apparel business in the Benelux and to build a strong position in the DACH countries. Just Brands is building the business step by step, consistently offering their partners and their consumers high–quality, relevant products with distinctive image platforms and related services. Just Brands is a proud company with a focus on the long term with high ethical standards and respect for the environment.

The company culture is based on shared commitment and dedication to fulfilling their goals, it encourages entrepreneurship and personal growth in a healthy, no-nonsense, honest and open working atmosphere.

• Sales, consulting and providing service to customers
• Goods processing
• Cash transactions

profile_positions.company: Volvo Ocean Race 沃尔沃环球帆船赛
profile_positions.description:
The Volvo Ocean Race takes place every 3 years and is the world’s longest professional sporting event and leading offshore sailing competition with professional crews racing around the world. The 13th edition of the Volvo Ocean Race starts in Alicante in Autumn 2017. In the lead up to the start of the race a stakeholder conference has been organized by Volvo Ocean Race (3 day event).

Event support
• Support Volvo Ocean Race Head of Events & Hospitality and Events Coordinator
• Welcoming guests (150+ stakeholders) and be on stand-by for any questions to answer
• Oversee catering company and work with Volvo Hallen Events Manager on delivery event
• Logistics: booking taxi’s, assisting with the busses and guide guests to pick-up location(s)
• Overall venue management: presentations in main conference room (day 1), workshops (day 2)
and Host City speed meetings (day 3)
profile_positions.title: Event support

profile_positions.company: Volvo Ocean Race 沃尔沃环球帆船赛
profile_positions.description:
The presentation of Volvo Ocean Race’s first Team Base prototype is a milestone, not only for the next edition of the race but also in the Volvo Ocean Race’s history. Volvo Ocean Race organized the launch of the Team Bases & Sailors Terrace (3 months preparation, 1 day event) and invited all related race stakeholders, suppliers and partners. 

Project- and event coordinator
•	Communications: save the date, invitation, in- and exterior banners (content & design)
•	Finance & admin: managed budget, approved quote’s and invoices 
•	Managed external companies such as catering and audio/video suppliers
•	Logistics: arranged for nearby parking at external company + managing operational implications
•	Prepared detailed run sheets for all stakeholders (Crane Container, Volvo Ocean Race, catering company; Vermaat BV and audio/video supplier.
•	Over-all project- and event management: name badges, guest list, set-up various rooms for functions (presentation room, coffee room etc.)
profile_positions.title: Project- and event coordinator Team Base launch

profile_positions.description:
Cordaan is with almost 6,000 employees and more than 2,500 volunteers one of the biggest health institutions of Amsterdam. Cordaan accommodate around 20,000 people from 120 locations in all districts of Amsterdam and want to take responsibility for the development of long-term care in the city.

Internship; advice report for the division of purchase, which has been implemented.
•	Assignment: optimize the contract management system to buy-in of all products and services
o	worked directly with the board and its management teams
o	supported the division of purchase, advised them on the optimization of the new ordering and billing system: Pro Quro 
o	supported with the first implementation steps
profile_positions.title: Intern purchase division

profile_positions.description:
The Tom Tailor Group is one of the leading fashion houses in Germany and Europe. With its two umbrella brands Tom Tailor and Bonita, the group addresses complementary target groups van 0 to 60 years of age.

Tom Tailor has presented itself with a new brand identity since August 2014. With the further development of its core brand, TOM TAILOR is strengthening its international profile and positioning itself as a “new urban player”. The new brand attitude reflects the slogan which appeals to self-confident target groups with a high affinity for lifestyle and fashion: “Life is a game, play it, be confident, dress in style.”
